entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
